donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The main objective is to support Anti-corruption initiatives in the mainland through the National Anti Corruption Strategy and Action plan(NACSAP) is to see Corruption significantly reduced through; Improved anti-corruption leadership, management, partnership and funding; Radical improvement of national transparency (Government, Judiciary, Parliament, Private Sector, Civil Society Organizations); Improved public anti-corruption confidence and national integrity.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
This project 'Support to Anti-Corruption Initiatives in Zanzibar' aims at enabling corruption prevention by supporting development and implementation of Zanzibar anti-corruption strategy and enhancing the institutional capacity of the newly established Zanzibar Anti-Corruption and Economic Crimes Authority (ZACECA) in civic engagement, outreach, partnership building and analytical research on corruption issues as well as supporting induction and specialized training for staff. 
The project supports the achievement of the national strategic goals set in MKUZA II and Vision 2020.

The project aims at achieving the following specific outputs:
• Anti-corruption strategy developed and implemented
• Capacity of Anti-Corruption institutions to co-ordinate corruption activities, investigate and prosecute high level corruption strengthened
• Sectoral Approach for Corruption Prevention Supported
• Anti-corruption public awareness, outreach and information dissemination activities supported
